message: It sounds like the APTOS Bearables project is a really exciting and innovative initiative that could bring a lot of great opportunities to users of the NFT market. It's great that they are building a DAO to govern the platform, which will ensure that all decisions are made through a transparent and democratic process. The borrowing and lending capabilities, NFT marketplace, and staking as a service are all really interesting features that could help to drive the growth of the NFT market. I'm looking forward to seeing how this project evolves over time! Would you like me to provide more information on any of these features?
speaker: BOSWORTH
